channel.title: taxi on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in taxi on Barefoot Rob

item.title: taxi rotary photos
item.description: 18:28 Thursday 03 May 2018 JST This could be made into Taxi Turnaround Timelapse, but I do not have an easy way to do that and do not want to spend any more time on it.

item.title: arrived in Japan
item.description: 23:56 Monday 01 January 2018 JST We have arrived back in Haneda and are in a taxi back home. Didn’t realize trains would not be running very late so yay for 12000 yen for stale smoke flavored taxi. Last train was at 11:51 and would require two transfers, including from KQ Kawasaki to JR Kawasaki station. I get to work on MT3 tomorrow yayyy!

item.title: arrived in São Paulo
item.description: 18:55 Friday 15 December 2017 -03 Rodrigo got the days mixed up so was not at the airport to meet us as planned, but helped us by estimating the taxi price; it’s 75% of the cash we have handy, but we can make it! 21:22 Friday 15 December 2017 -02 Oh, São Paulo is actually an hour ahead of Fortaleza, so we are in -02.
